data.title: Community Christian College
data.meta_description: For the past 25 years, Community Christian College has been serving students and their parents by offering an affordable associate degree presented in a safe Christian worldview environment.
data.text:
cCc is a minority serving institution with a commitment to providing inner city youth with a real chance at success. cCc meets the students where they are and brings them to a level of reading, writing, and comprehension that will make the transfer to a four-year college much easier. (You can’t graduate from cCc by taking multiple choice tests only.) TRACS, cCc’s accreditor, just awarded cCc another 10 years. Our tuition rate and athletic fee are extremely affordable and currently there are no book costs. cCc offers a fixed curriculum that rotates every 18 months. This means that a student can graduate with an associate degree in 18 months if they stay on schedule. (Compare any of these options with that offered at your local community colleges.)

Congratulations to the Jacksonville Sports Program. Former Football Players Secure Recruitment to D1 and D2 Colleges. Click here to download details. (The document is in MS Word Format for hearing purposes.)

Community Christian College

For the past 26 years, Community Christian College has been serving students and their parents by offering an affordable associate degree presented in a safe Christian worldview environment. Our liberal arts associate degree program provides you with most, if not all, of the lower-division courses needed for the bachelor's degree. Currently, cCc operates four online learning support centers located in Redland, California, Detroit, Michigan, the Atlanta Metro Area, Jacksonville, Florida, and in the Lafeyette Metro Area, Louisiana.

cCc’s moto is actiones Seneca . . . “Actions speak louder than words.” Our mission is to serve the inner city communities. To that end, cCc is a government recognized minority serving institution and we are proud of it.

Help Us be Great, DONATE!

CCC offers an associates of arts in liberal arts (A.A.) with no emphasis or you can take any of the following elective options:

Faith

Faith is a gift of God and joins us to Christ, but we are given the responsibility and privilege to exercise our faith.

Your journey begins here. Learn how to put your God-given talents to use.

The Christian faith is our foundation for teaching you how to advance your education, personal development, and service.

Come to Community Christian College, and surround yourself with a Christian worldview. Develop character and strive for the best for your family, community and self.

Financial aid available

Personal attention designed around your individual needs

Complete your AA on time and move on to career or your BA

Take a step of faith now. Learn more about how a Community Christian College education transforms your life. Apply now through our easy application process. It takes only a few minutes.

Hope

We have the hope that does not disappoint because our hope is in the eternal God who pours his love into our hearts. Your aspirations should drive your education. It starts with the foundation of a sound liberal arts curriculum. At CCC, you develop exceptional study habits, gain valuable critical thinking skills, and focus on the steps that lead to your AA, BA, and whatever is next. You dream it, now do it. Take the next step, apply today.

Love

Jesus's greatest commandments were to love. "And you shall love the Lord with all your heart and with all your soul and with all your mind and with all your strength. The second is this: ‘You shall love your neighbor as yourself.’ There is no other commandment greater than these." Christ's commands are our passion. Come learn how to love God and neighbor in our loving Christian community, what we call Community Christian College. Commit to apply today.

Consumer Information
